sectionIIDescription: Status of the revised or updated national biodiversity strategies and action plans (NBSAPs) in the light of the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework
revisedNbsap: Has your country revised or updated NBSAPs in the light of the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework?
indicateCompletionDate: Please indicate the anticipated date of completion of the revision or updating of the NBSAP
stakeholderEngagement: Did your country involve and engage stakeholders in revising or updating NBSAPs?
hasNbsapAdopted: Has your country's revised or updated NBSAPs been adopted as policy or legal instruments?
indicateAdoptionDate: Please indicate the anticipated date of adoption
policyInstrument: Please indicate the type of policy instrument your country's revised or updated NBSAPs has been adopted as
